collection.name: source_start_session

variables.name: user
variables.description:
Returned user object list:

  • user$id - user unique id
  • user$login - user login

params.label: Session bank
params.description:
Session table definition:

  • default - uses default session table
  • custom - define your own session table
params.name: session_bank

params.label: Resume session?
params.description: If there is previous session available for authorised user, should it be used instead of creating a new one?
params.name: resume_session

params.label: Resume session time limit.
params.description:
Resume session time limit in seconds.
0 for unlimited.
params.name: resume_session_time_limit

params.label: Type
params.description:
Authorization type

  • user table - predefined user bank that let's users log in using login/password combination
  • direct user - user passed by direct_user parameter will be used
params.name: type

params.label: User bank
params.description:
User bank table type:

  • default - uses default Concerto table; user needs to be inserted first
  • direct - can be defined directly in wizard form
  • custom - used to define your own table that you want to use as user bank
params.name: user_bank

steps.title: Registration
steps.description:
Public registration settings.

Public registration is only possible when user table is used for user authorisation.

params.label: Registration form
params.value:
{"paragraph":"

Please fill the form below:<\/p>\n","login_label":"Login","login_alert":"Invalid login!","password_label":"Password","password_alert":"Invalid password!","password_confirmation_label":"Password confirmation","password_confirmation_alert":"Password confirmation and password doesn't match!","email_label":"Email","email_alert":"Invalid email!","register_button_label":"register","login_exists_alert":"Login already exists!","title":"REGISTRATION"}
params.name: registration_form

definition.defvalue: Password confirmation and password doesn't match!

params.label: Email confirmation request page
params.value:
{"title":"EMAIL CONFIRMATION","content":"

Email has been sent to your address. Please follow the link in the email to confirm your address.<\/p>\n"}
params.name: email_conf_request_page

definition.defvalue: Email has been sent to your address. Please follow the link in the email to confirm your address.

params.label: Email confirmation success page
params.value:
{"title":"EMAIL CONFIRMATION","content":"

Your email address has been successfully verified. Please refresh the page to log in.<\/p>\n"}
params.name: email_conf_success_page

definition.defvalue: Your email address has been successfully verified. Please refresh the page to log in.

params.label: Confirmation email
params.value:
{"sender":"concerto@domain.com","subject":"email confirmation","paragraph":"

To verify your email address please click HERE<\/a>.<\/p>\n","template":"start_session_confirmation_mail"}
params.name: email_confirmation

definition.defvalue: To verify your email address please click HERE.

fields.name: suffix_text
fields.label: Suffix text for number, e.g. " USD" - note the extra space (optional)
